text: u s representative districts rsa is repealed and reenacted to read as follows u s representative districts the state is divided into districts for the choosing of representatives in the congress of the united states each district may elect one representative the districts shall be constituted as follows the first district is constituted of a the county of belknap b in the county of carroll the towns of moultonborough tuftonboro wolfeboro c in the county of grafton the town of bridgewater d in the county of hillsborough the towns and city of bedford goffstown hudson litchfield manchester merrimack new boston pelham weare e in the county of merrimack the towns and city of allenstown canterbury chichester danbury dunbarton epsom franklin hill hooksett loudon northfield pembroke pittsfield f in the county of rockingham the towns and city of atkinson auburn brentwood candia chester danville derry deerfield east kingston epping exeter fremont greenland hampstead hampton hampton falls kensington kingston londonderry newfields newmarket newton north hampton northwood nottingham plaistow raymond rye salem sandown seabrook south hampton stratham windham g in the county of strafford the towns of new durham strafford the second district is constituted of a the counties of cheshire coos sullivan b in the county of carroll the towns and unincorporated places of albany bartlett brookfield chatham conway eaton effingham freedom hale s location hart s location jackson ossipee madison sandwich tamworth wakefield c in the county of grafton the towns city and unincorporated place of alexandria ashland bath benton bethlehem bristol campton canaan dorchester easton ellsworth enfield franconia grafton groton hanover haverhill hebron holderness landaff lebanon lincoln lisbon littleton livermore lyman lyme monroe orange orford piermont plymouth rumney sugar hill thornton warren waterville valley wentworth woodstock d in the county of hillsborough the towns and city of amherst antrim bennington brookline deering francestown greenfield greenville hancock hillsborough hollis lyndeborough mason milford mont vernon nashua new ipswich peterborough sharon temple wilton windsor e in the county of merrimack the towns and city of andover boscawen bow bradford concord henniker hopkinton newbury new london salisbury sutton warner webster wilmot f in the county of rockingham the towns and city of new castle newington portsmouth g in the county of strafford the towns of barrington dover durham farmington lee madbury middleton milton rochester rollinsford somersworth application this act shall in no way disqualify any person from any elective office to which he or she was elected prior to the effective date of this act
